description: A scenic flat walk along part of the Victoria Gorge. Frequently used by joggers. This section is a linear out and back.What I actually did was a very long walk about 13 km from Johnson Street using both streets an part of galloping Goose. See map in pictures
directions: Parking lot for Esquimalt Gorge Park (off Tillicum rd) Park here and cross the bridge to the pathway or if it's not full parking lot for Kosapsom park off Admirals rd and Gorge rd W
title: Gorge Parkway
